course_description: Students will be introduced to classical and vernacular traditions from throughout the world, and equipped with skills they need to research and write critically about musical cultures, repertoires, and practices. Designed for music majors/minors, it is a prerequisite for many other music courses.
sections: Class Nbr: 3034, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: M. Ishiguro, Status: Open
